message.content:
cs.AR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of LSTM neural networks for Automatic Speech Recognition, which falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper proposes a hardware accelerator for LSTM computations, which falls under the category of Computer Architecture and Embedded Systems (cs.AR). The paper also discusses the efficiency and adaptiveness of the proposed accelerator, which falls under the categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses the use of dynamic reconfigurable architecture, which falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY).
